description:
New Pokémon sets are releasing all the time, and with them come a host of new trading cards to collect. So far, there's been almost 100 mainline Pokémon card sets, with special boosters adding even more cards into the mix. That's a lot of Pokémon. If you need help keeping up with Pokémon releases, then we're here to help - with a complete, start-to-finish list of Pokémon TCG expansions.

Continue reading All Pokémon sets in the trading card game
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Trading Card Game
title: All Pokémon sets in the trading card game

description:
The MTG card Quakebringer has spiked in price over the last couple of weeks, going from $1.70 at the start of the month to $6 today (May 15). Based on MTG Goldfish’s price charts, the card has risen by a pretty impressive 253% in that short window. This giant berserker from the MTG set Kaldheim … Continued

Continue reading Combo-breaking MTG card sees a price spike of 250%

title: Combo-breaking MTG card sees a price spike of 250%

description:
‘One DnD’ is the codename we’ve been using to refer to the next generation of Dungeons and Dragons. It’s a broad term that covers everything from the next D&D books to digital tools Wizards of the Coast will use to expand the way we play. The One DnD release date is almost upon us, so if you’re looking to learn more about the future of D&D, you’ve come to the right place. Here you’ll find everything we know so far.

Continue reading One DnD release date and news
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: One DnD release date and news

description:
Games Workshop has revealed a new set of Warhammer 40k mission cards, Chapter Approved: Pariah Nexus, which will replace the current Leviathan deck for “the next year of matched play”. New mission rules promise to boost the performance of Battleline units, while Secret Missions will act as a new catch up mechanic for players who’ve fallen … Continued

Continue reading New Warhammer 40k missions buff struggling Battleline units

title: New Warhammer 40k missions buff struggling Battleline units

description:
The DnD Comprehend Languages spell is a simple utility option that allows you to overcome language barriers in your Dungeons and Dragons game. Want to decipher some important documents, but can’t speak Draconic? Comprehend Languages. Need to know what your Fey foes are plotting, but you don’t understand Sylvan? It’s time for Comprehend Languages 5e. … Continued

Continue reading DnD Comprehend Languages 5e spell guide

title: DnD Comprehend Languages 5e spell guide

description:
The Warhammer 40k Assassins are rare but powerful agents of the Imperium of Man. With their unique weapons, bio-augmetic enhancements, and secretive training, they are the High Lords’ ultimate tool to silence dissent, crush rebellion, and remove dangerous and charismatic leaders. This guide introduces each of the Assassin Temples within the Officio Assassinorum, and explains … Continued

Continue reading Warhammer 40k Assassins guide

title: Warhammer 40k Assassins guide

description:
The front cover of the upcoming DnD Player’s Handbook has been revealed, showing us exactly what the book will look like when it hits store shelves on September, 17, 2024. description:
Looking to top up your collection with awesome new Lego sets, or find a gift for that block-building obsessive in your life? We've got you covered - this guide tracks the best new Lego sets from the last 12 months. We've selected quite a range - from handsome display pieces for adult construction toy fans, through to classic affordable playthings (with a fantastic Star Wars Lego set in the mix, too).

Shiny new Lego sets aren’t all the brand has to offer, though. If you’re more concerned by heft than release date, check out our guide to the biggest Lego sets ever released. Do you prefer the
title: Best new Lego sets
